item.description:
Northampton Area "Young" Professionals is at it again! This is also a chance for the "young" professionals to interface with "more experienced" professionals- so don't think to much about how "young" you are... it is a chance for area professionals to mingle in a great new venue with an outdoor patio.....

"Different name, same great opportunity to connect with local professionals!

Join us September 13 from 5:00-7:00 at Lit in Amherst, a restaurant and nightclub "bringing a city vibe to small town Amherst."


Our featured non-profit for September will be Community Enterprises. Community Enterprises provides job training, employment, case management, education and housing supports for people with disabilities. It operates 20 service locations throughout Connecticut, Massachusetts and Long Island New York.


Lit's location will make it easy to head downtown for the Amherst Business Improvement District Block Party after the networking social.

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: NAYP's September Networking Social
